title: Another Indian trawler seized in Mannar for poaching
content: An Indian trawler with eight fishermen on board was seized while poaching in Sri Lankan waters last night (26), says the Navy.The Indians were engaged in the illegal fishing method known as ‘bottom trawling’ north of Talaimannar in Mannar.The Navy has apprehended nine Indian vessels with 59 fishermen for poaching in Sri Lankan waters son far this month.
